title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: University Sports Education Design Using OBE-Based Blended Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% of the physical education objectives set under the OBE (Outcome-Based Education) framework
Using self-directed learning strategies, learners maintain physical activities at least twice weekly
Learners can develop personalized exercise plans applying scientific principles (e.g., exercise physiology)
Through peer and self-assessment, learners improve learning outcomes by over 15%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
